observer
Class Publisher

java.lang.Object
  observer.Publisher
Direct Known Subclasses:
EventsModel
Deprecated. 26 July 2006 

public class Publisher
extends java.lang.Object

State participant of the Observer design pattern. Registers and notifies all observers of changes to shared data. FSA data models requiring multiple concurrent views should extend this class.

Author:
helen bretzke

addSubscriber

public void addSubscriber(Subscriber observer)
Deprecated. 
Attaches the given observer to this model object. This observer will receive notifications of changes to this model.

Parameters:

removeSubscriber

Deprecated. 
Detaches the given observer to this model object. This observer will no longer receive notifications of changes to this model.
